00037 
00056     class _OgreExport SkeletonSerializer : public Serializer
00057     {
00058     public:
00059         SkeletonSerializer();
00060         virtual ~SkeletonSerializer();
00061 
00062 
00071         void exportSkeleton(const Skeleton* pSkeleton, const String& filename,
00072             Endian endianMode = ENDIAN_NATIVE);
00073

00083         // TODO: provide Cal3D importer?

00090         void writeAnimation(const Skeleton* pSkel, const Animation* anim);

00092         void writeKeyFrame(const Skeleton* pSkel, const TransformKeyFrame* key);

00094             const LinkedSkeletonAnimationSource& link);
00095 
00096         // Internal import methods
00097         void readBone(DataStreamPtr& stream, Skeleton* pSkel);
00098         void readBoneParent(DataStreamPtr& stream, Skeleton* pSkel);
00099         void readAnimation(DataStreamPtr& stream, Skeleton* pSkel);
00100         void readAnimationTrack(DataStreamPtr& stream, Animation* anim, Skeleton* pSkel);
00101         void readKeyFrame(DataStreamPtr& stream, NodeAnimationTrack* track, Skeleton* pSkel);
00102         void readSkeletonAnimationLink(DataStreamPtr& stream, Skeleton* pSkel);
00103 
00104         size_t calcBoneSize(const Skeleton* pSkel, const Bone* pBone);
00105         size_t calcBoneSizeWithoutScale(const Skeleton* pSkel, const Bone* pBone);
00106         size_t calcBoneParentSize(const Skeleton* pSkel);
00107         size_t calcAnimationSize(const Skeleton* pSkel, const Animation* pAnim);
00108         size_t calcAnimationTrackSize(const Skeleton* pSkel, const NodeAnimationTrack* pTrack);
00109         size_t calcKeyFrameSize(const Skeleton* pSkel, const TransformKeyFrame* pKey);
